name: IKFixes
author: NotAKidoS
description:
A few small fixes and configuration options to IK. Major ones are listed below:

**FBT** - Fixes root rotation animation bleeding, chest tracking, locomotion animations, and bend goal offsets.

**Halfbody** - Fixes footsteps while on a Movement Parent & feet always pointing in head direction.
changelog:
- Updates for 2023r171
- Removed unneeded settings (IKPose & NetIKPass).
- Fixed halfbody fake root angle option.
- Added Reset Settings UIExpansionKit button.
